text: Ndipo pamene choonadi chadza kwa iwo kuchokera kwa Ife, iwo ali kufunsa kuti, “Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani iye sadapatsidwe monga zomwe zidapatsidwa kwa Mose?” Kodi iwo sadakane zimene zidapatsidwa kwa Mose kale? Iwo amati, “Zizindikiro ziwiri za matsenga zili zothandizana.” Ndiponso amanena, “Ife sitidzakhulupirira mu china chilichonse cha zimenezi.”
